title: Client Onboarding
initialStepDescription1: The information we request from you will help us complete setting up your account.
initialStepDescription2: Please review and update any information that needs confirmation; and provide any additional information requested.
initialStepNoOrganizationType: Please select your organization type to preview the information you will need to confirm or provide.
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformation: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}) using {{product}} in {{jurisdiction}}, you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformationBa: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}), you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
initialStepOrganizationTypeInformationFu: As a $t(organizationTypes.{{organizationType}}) using {{product}} in {{jurisdiction}}, you will need to confirm or provide the following information:
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionEdit: Make changes to beneficial owner information here. Click save when you're done.
beneficialOwnerDialogDescriptionAdd: Fill out the information for the new beneficial owner here. Click save when you're done.

errorMessages.default: An error occurred while fetching client data. Please try again.
errorMessages.clientNotFound: Client not found. Please try again or contact support.

initialStepNotes.title: Important Notes
initialStepNotes.additionalQuestions: Additional questions may be required based on your provided information
initialStepNotes.llcOwners: As an LLC, you will be able to add additional beneficial owners
initialStepNotes.attestation: You will need to review and attest to the accuracy of all provided information
initialStepNotes.kycProcess: Identity verification (KYC) process will be required for all controlling parties
initialStepNotes.termsAndConditions: You will need to review and accept the Terms & Conditions

messages.solePropEinOptional: As a sole proprietor, an EIN is optional unless you have employees or file certain tax returns.

copyBusinessAddressLabel: Controller's personal address is the same as the business address

statusMessages.NEW: A new client application has been submitted and is awaiting review.
statusMessages.REVIEW_IN_PROGRESS: The client application is currently under review.
statusMessages.INFORMATION_REQUESTED: Additional information has been requested from the client.
statusMessages.APPROVED: The client application has been approved.
statusMessages.DECLINED: The client application has been declined.
statusMessages.SUSPENDED: The client account has been temporarily suspended.
statusMessages.TERMINATED: The client account has been terminated.

notification.title: KYC Process in Progress
notification.description: Your client KYC process is currently being reviewed. Please check back regularly for updates on the verification status.

toast.title: Notifications Enabled
toast.description: You will receive updates about your KYC process status.

reviewAndAttest.allRequirementsComplete: All outstanding KYC requirements have been addressed.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description: Please read and attest the below documents by J.P. Morgan to complete the process.
termsAndConditions.dataAccuracyCheckbox: The data I am providing is true, accurate, current and complete to the best of my knowledge.
termsAndConditions.termsCheckbox: I have read and agree to the below attestation documents:
termsAndConditions.openDocumentsWarning: Please open the documents links to enable the terms and conditions checkbox.
termsAndConditions.submitDisabled: Please agree to all terms and review all documents

outstandingKYC.title: Outstanding KYC Requirements
outstandingKYC.description: Please complete the following before initiating KYC:

missingPartyFields.title: Action Required
missingPartyFields.description: Please provide the following missing information:

stepInfo.InitialDetails: **Getting Started:** This step collects basic information about your business. Please have your business registration documents ready.
stepInfo.OrganizationDetails: **Business Structure:** You'll need to provide detailed information about your business structure, including registration details and business identifiers.
stepInfo.IndividualDetails: **Controller Information:** Information about the primary person controlling the business operations. This should be someone with significant responsibility for managing the business.
stepInfo.BusinessOwners: **Ownership Details:** List all individuals who own 25% or more of the business. For each owner, you'll need to provide personal identification and contact details.
stepInfo.AdditionalQuestions: **Due Diligence:** These questions help us better understand your business operations and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
stepInfo.DocumentUpload: **Required Documents:** Upload supporting documentation to verify your business information. Accepted formats include PDF, JPG, and PNG.
stepInfo.ReviewAndAttest: **Final Review:** Review all provided information carefully before submitting. You'll need to certify that all information is accurate and complete.

beneficialOwnerStepForm.controllerIsOwnerQuestion: Do you, the controller, own 25% or more of the business?
beneficialOwnerStepForm.maxOwnersWarning: You can only add up to 4 beneficial owners.
beneficialOwnerStepForm.controllerCannotBeOwnerWarning: You cannot set yourself as an owner since you can only add up to 4 beneficial owners.

organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_LIABILITY_COMPANY: A Limited Liability Company (LLC) is a business structure that combines the pass-through taxation of a partnership or sole proprietorship with the limited liability of a corporation.
organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_LIABILITY_PARTNERSHIP: A Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) is a partnership in which some or all partners have limited liabilities. It therefore exhibits elements of partnerships and corporations.
organizationTypeDescriptions.GENERAL_PARTNERSHIP: A General Partnership is a business structure in which two or more individuals manage and operate a business in accordance with the terms and objectives set out in a Partnership Deed.
organizationTypeDescriptions.LIMITED_PARTNERSHIP: A Limited Partnership (LP) is a form of partnership similar to a general partnership, except that in addition to one or more general partners, there are one or more limited partners.
organizationTypeDescriptions.C_CORPORATION: A C Corporation is a legal structure for a corporation in which the owners, or shareholders, are taxed separately from the entity.
organizationTypeDescriptions.S_CORPORATION: An S Corporation is a corporation that meets the IRS requirements to be taxed under Subchapter S of the Internal Revenue Code.
organizationTypeDescriptions.PARTNERSHIP: A Partnership is a business structure in which two or more individuals manage and operate a business in accordance with the terms and objectives set out in a Partnership Deed.
organizationTypeDescriptions.PUBLICLY_TRADED_COMPANY: A Publicly Traded Company is a company that has issued securities through an initial public offering (IPO) and is traded on at least one stock exchange or in over-the-counter markets.
organizationTypeDescriptions.NON_PROFIT_CORPORATION: A Non-Profit Corporation is a legal entity that is formed for the purpose of serving a public or mutual benefit other than the pursuit or accumulation of profits for owners or investors.
organizationTypeDescriptions.GOVERNMENT_ENTITY: A Government Entity is a state, local, or federal organization that has a specific function or authority.
organizationTypeDescriptions.SOLE_PROPRIETORSHIP: A Sole Proprietorship is a business that is owned and operated by a single person.
organizationTypeDescriptions.UNINCORPORATED_ASSOCIATION: An Unincorporated Association is a group of people who come together for a common purpose but do not register as a corporation or limited liability company.
